title: I got permanent banned for no reason?(apparently i used a 3rd party program)

replies.body:
If you really didn't use anything, then **did you ever share your account with anyone?** You are responsible for all action taken on your account, so if you shared your account with someone for any reason, and they used 3rd party programs/scripts/hacks etc. on your account, then your account will be banned for it. Account sharing is also against the ToS.
___
If you wish to appeal the ban then you can [submit a support ticket](http://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), however, if they say no then on a second look the ban is still legitimate, and the chances of getting your account unbanned are basically zero.

Player support cannot tell you what was detected because that would also tell you and anyone you chose to share the information with what was NOT detected and thus it compromises further investigations.
